data.actual_result: You scroll down by a random amount
data.expected_result: You should stay scrolled at the top
data.short_description: When reordering whole categories, your channel list will scroll down by a random amount
data.steps_to_repro: - Have a server with a lot of channels and categories - Make sure you are scrolled all the way up in channel list - Go to Server Settings > Channels - Select Category Sort mode - Move a bottom category to the very top - Close Settings, open your channel drawer and observe
